attributes.action: name and shame those companies that have breached the OECD Guidelines supply chain or human rights provisions in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the UK Government holding DAS Air accountable for breaching OECD (Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development) Guidelines in the DRC, we petition you to continue these efforts and encourage other Governments to dissuade companies from sourcing from the Eastern DRC.
